name: mission-control
description: Mission Control for OpenClaw - Autonomous agent orchestration and observability
author: Jarrett West

scripts.ci:prepare: pnpm --filter @mission-control/shared build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/state-machine build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/policy-engine build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/coordinator build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/memory build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/agent-runtime build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/voice build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/telegraph build && pnpm --filter @mission-control/meetings build
scripts.ci:typecheck: pnpm run ci:prepare && pnpm --filter mission-control-ui typecheck && pnpm --filter @mission-control/telegram-bot typecheck && pnpm --filter @mission-control/orchestration-server typecheck
scripts.ci:test: pnpm --filter @mission-control/shared test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/state-machine test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/policy-engine test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/coordinator test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/context-router test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/memory test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/agent-runtime test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/voice test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/telegraph test && pnpm --filter @mission-control/meetings test && pnpm exec vitest run convex/__tests__/tasks.test.ts convex/__tests__/integration.test.ts convex/__tests__/operatorControls.test.ts convex/__tests__/armPolicy.test.ts && pnpm run test:e2e:arm
